sprykerComponent.name: flash-message
sprykerComponent.readme:
Displays a simple notification that informs users about important events that may have happened.

Code sample

{% include molecule('display-address') with {
    data: {
        action: 'action',
        title: 'title',
        text: 'text',
        icon: null
    }
} only %}

defines.name: data

methods.name: showFor
methods.description: Shows the flash message during the time set.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: A number value which defines the period of time for which the flash message is shown.
